thread.title: Elderly woman draws a crowd with Leicester fans in Seville by showing off her dance moves ahead of Champions League tie
thread.title_full: Elderly woman draws a crowd with Leicester fans in Seville by showing off her dance moves ahead of Champions League tie

author: supal
title: Elderly woman draws a crowd with Leicester fans in Seville by showing off her dance moves ahead of Champions League tie
text:
EFL DANCING QUEEN Elderly woman draws a crowd with Leicester fans in Seville by showing off her dance moves ahead of Champions League tie 
The old lady took centre stage outside a bar in Seville before Leicester's last 16 clash By SUNNI UPAL 22nd February 2017, 6:28 pm This may just be the best pre-match party ever. 
Leicester fans are clearly enjoying their trip to Seville for their Champions League knock-out clash. 5 Leicester fans dance with an elderly woman in Seville 
And one elderly lady was the centre of attention as she showed off her moves while crowds gathered round. 
This hilarious video shows the woman giving it all she’s got outside a bar in the Spanish city. 
It’s unclear whether she’s part of the travelling contingent, or just a passer by in Seville looking for a quick dance. 
The trip comes as a welcome break for the Premier League champions from their current relegation battle. 
After partying all summer long at their stunning title win, it’s been a season mainly of doom and gloom domestically.
